name: Send won ActiveCampaign deals to Facebook Conversions API
description:
Every time a deal is won in ActiveCampaign, a new conversion will be uploaded to Facebook Conversions API. 

The deal will also get a timestamp of the upload time into a custom field in ActiveCampaign so the template does not upload the same deal over and over in case more changes are being made to the deal later.

The template expects your ActiveCampaign account to have a custom field called "Uploaded to Facebook Conversion API".
